events.message: I recently received my order but want to request a refund as the product did not meet my expectations and I would like to return it.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request to return the product and get money back.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle this customer's refund request promptly.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, may I ask why you are unsatisfied with the product or if there is any issue that caused your decision?
The item is fine, but it just does not fit my needs. I bought the wrong size and wish to return it and get a refund.
Thank you for the information. We can process your refund once we receive the returned item. Please use the prepaid shipping label we will send you shortly.
Thanks, that works for me. I will wait for the shipping label and send back the product as soon as possible.
The shipping label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the product, your refund will be processed promptly. Let us know if you have any other questions.
Just following up to check if you were able to send the product back using the shipping label and if you need further assistance.
Yes, I dropped the package off yesterday. Please let me know when the refund is processed.
We have received the returned product and issued your refund. The amount should appear on your account within 3-5 business days.
Your refund case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support and feel free to reach out if you need help in the future.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. We appreciate your feedback to improve our service.
